nodes.bodyText: Can this be null or fail somehow?
Why there is a list of 1 element here? Can't we wait until the list is needed to create a Collection.singletonList()?

@adrielparedes you are right we dont need a list here. But  in method "Group get(String identifier)", i remember it was added to intialise the interface RolesResource since it was used inside and outside lambda expression. Please see
Is this always going to return a value or could be null?

IMO it shouldn't never return a null value since these function chain just helps to generate the right URI for the SSO calls. The return value of this method which is of type RolesResource is the final URI created.
@adrielparedes I have refractored the code. Thanks
Is this a default value? Does client always have to be kie?

@tomasdavidorg I guess It should be "kie" always. because this BC uses this identifier to find the client where business central URI is configured in RHSSO. We mention the same way in doc
https://access.redhat.com/documentation/en-us/red_hat_process_automation_manager/7.8/html-single/integrating_red_hat_process_automation_manager_with_red_hat_single_sign-on/index#sso-central-client-create-proc
though i think this should be mentioned in our docs as a mandatory.
The formatting of the header is broken on the new files.
